entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
